Uses of Interface
parallel.distributed.DMsgIntf

  • Packages that use DMsgIntf 
    Package Description
    parallel.distributed
    Extends the basic functionality found in the parallel package over many remote JVMs distributed over a network of machines.

    • Uses of DMsgIntf in parallel.distributed

      Classes in parallel.distributed that implement DMsgIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DBarrierAddRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DBarrierSrv to add the corresponding thread to its pool of participants in the DBarrier.
      class  DBarrierRequest
      implements a request to enter the barrier state.
      class  DBarrierRmRequest
      class implementing a DBarrier Remove Request for the associated thread that called the relevant DBarrier.removeCurrentThread() method.
      class  DConditionCounterAwaitRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to await its associated ConditionCounter until it reaches zero.
      class  DConditionCounterDecrRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to decrement its associated ConditionCounter.
      class  DConditionCounterIncrRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to increment its associated ConditionCounter.
      class  DConditionCounterResetRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to reset its associated ConditionCounter.
      class  DConditionCounterShutDownRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to shut-down.
      class  DFileAccessSrvStatsRequest
      class encapsulates request to return statistics about the server cache for a specific file being read.
      class  DFileDataVectorReadRequest
      class encapsulates request to read from a file residing on a machine running a msg-passing coordinator server, a certain range of vectors.
      class  DRecvMsg
      implements a wrapper object for a "recvData()" request from a (local/remote) thread that is transmitted via the socket wire to the parallel.distributed.DMsgPassingCoordinatorSrv.
      class  DReduceAddRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DReduceSrv to add the corresponding thread to its pool of participants in the DReducer.
      class  DReduceRequest
      implements a request to enter a distributed reduce operation.
      class  DReduceRmRequest
      class implementing a DReducer Remove Request for the associated thread that called the relevant DReducer.removeCurrentThread() method.
      class  DRLockGetRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DRWLockSrv identified by name to get to the current thread a global read-lock.
      class  DRLockReleaseRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DRWLockSrv identified by name to release from the current thread a global read-lock.
      class  DSendMsg
      implements a wrapper object for a "sendData()" request from a (local/remote) thread that is transmitted via the socket wire to the parallel.distributed.DMsgPassingCoordinatorSrv.
      class  DWLockGetRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DRWLockSrv identified by name to get to the current thread a global write-lock.
      class  DWLockReleaseRequest
      implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DRWLockSrv identified by name to release from the current thread a global write-lock.
      Methods in parallel.distributed with parameters of type DMsgIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object DActiveMsgPassingCoordinatorLongLivedConnClt.sendAndRecvData(int myid, DMsgIntf data)
      send data, and receive reply back.
      void DMsgPassingCoordinatorClt.sendData(DMsgIntf command)
      send a DMsgIntf object to be executed on the server.
